about_the_game:
Trepidation is a first-person horror co-op game where you need to collect as much treasure as possible while avoiding dangerous underwater creatures.

E X P L O R E

You and 3 of your friends play as a team of deep-sea explorers equipped with high-tech diving gear. Your mission is to navigate the treacherous underwater landscape, locate the lost treasures, and bring them back to the surface in hopes of becoming rich. But beware, the ocean is home to terrifying creatures that lurk in the darkness, ready to prey on unsuspecting divers.

L O O T

As you explore the ocean floor, you'll encounter a variety of creatures, each more terrifying than the last. From massive, hulking behemoths to agile, deadly predators, you'll need to use all of your wits and teamwork to survive. And when the pressure is on, you'll have to make split-second decisions that can mean the difference between life and death.

C O L L E C T

But the rewards are worth the risk. The treasures you collect can be used to upgrade your gear, build useful tools, or make you rich. And as you delve deeper into the abyss, you'll uncover why no one ever goes this deep. Make sure you don't leave your friends to die.
